structure.unit: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS

law.text: Within sixty (60) days after the passage of this ordinance the City Manager shall cause to be created an administrative process to guide the various City contracting departments as to how each is to interact in the per cent for public art process. (Ord. No. 2009-563, ยง2, 3-17-09, eff. 7-1-09)
